texto: 01.05/09/03 Grade Chemicals Document/ Area/ Activity Description Procedurea Dept.b This quality plan is applicable to the processes of production and distribution of Scope — — specification-grade chemicals. Quality objectives Our quality objectives are yield (93 %); on-time delivery (+/− 1 day).
